ygData.subject: Re: Spells and Reagents
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been told that you can get them off pixies and kobold hunters. But I haven t found any myself. I do know that you can buy them from jewelers. Think they
ygData.messageBody:
I've been told that you can get them off pixies and kobold hunters. But I
haven't found any myself. I do know that you can buy them from jewelers.
Think they sell for like 2.5 Gold...
-----Original Message-----
From: Cristie [mailto:cristie@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 9:48 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Spells and Reagents


Sheildskin (16th level spell) requires a cats eye agate I know because I
tried to cast and it told me I needed that. I believe its just one that you
need. Of course I couldn't find one to save my life...


At 04:23 PM 6/7/99 -0500, you wrote:

Hello All,
Could someone please post which spells require reagents and what the
reagent is for each?
Thank you.
Kueken, 15 Mith Marr.
